name: KEITH-MD
description: This is a simple whatsapp bot built with nodejs to make your WhatsApp enjoyable

PREFIX.description: choose your prefix for keith. To prevent errors and confusion you must set a prefix

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces "," Ex: 254748387615, 254796299159

OWNER_NAME.description: add your owner name for the bot

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: add your heroku api key here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: should match to your app name you placed above copy paste it here for the heroku vars setting

PM_PERMIT.description: type true if you don't want anyone to access your bot in pm.

SESSION.description: Paste the session id that you received in whatsapp after linking the bot. It's used for authentication.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically read all status update

EVENTS.description: choose whether to allow bot to detect events in groups such as promote, demote, remove and add. If set to true bot will send welcome/goodbye messages and signal when somebody is promoted or demoted.

AUTOBIO.description: Type true if you want bot to autoupdate it's bio constantly

ANTIDELETE.description: Type true if you want bot to undelete messages.

CHATBOT.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically reply to messages in your pm .

GREET.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically send greet text anytime the bot restats.

AUTODOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically download status update .

GREET_MSG.description: Set your greet message here for bot to send greet text when GREET us enabled
GREET_MSG.value: keith is unavailable kindly leave a message

VOICECHATBOT.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically send voice chat bot message privately

ANTICALL_MSG.description: add your anticall message .this works when anticall is enabled

ANTICALL.description: Type true if you want bot to reject unnecessary calls

GROUP_CONTROL.description: Type true if you want the bot to kick those who send link or bad words in group .

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Type true if you want bot to automatically like status updates, this will only work if AUTOVIEW_STATUS is true.

AUTOREAD.description: Put here true if you want bot to automatically bluetick messages in private.

WA_PRESENCE.description: This is your WhatsApp Presence Status: Here's how to set it up: Type *typing* if you want bot to show typing..., Type *recording* if you want bot to show recording..., Type *online* if you want bot to be always online, Leave this field blank if you want bot to show your actual presence.

MODE.description: Type private if you don't want other people to use the bot or public if you want everyone to access.
